home.subtitle: All-inclusive coliving for students and young professionals in Montreal's best neighborhoods. Move in today.
home.uniqueLocations: 8 unique locations across Montreal's best neighborhoods
home.whySubtitle: We handle the boring stuff so you can focus on what matters.
home.moveInReadyDesc: Fully furnished spaces with everything you need from day one. Just bring your bags.
home.zeroHassleDesc: WiFi, utilities, cleaning, maintenance — all included in one simple price.
home.communityDesc: Shared lounges, events, and spaces designed to help you connect with your people.
home.flexibleTermsDesc: No year-long leases. Stay as long as you need, leave when you're ready.
home.testimonial1: Moving to Montreal from Toronto was scary, but Coliville made it feel like home from day one. I met my best friends here and the location is unbeatable.
home.testimonial2: The all-inclusive pricing is a game changer. No surprise bills, no dealing with Hydro-Québec. Just one payment and everything is taken care of.
home.testimonial3: I was only supposed to stay for one semester but I ended up staying for two years. The community here is something special — it's more than just a place to sleep.
home.ctaSubtitle: Spots fill up fast. Secure your space in one of Montreal's most in-demand coliving communities.
